definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: The knurled all aluminum body allows the tips to be easily changed without the use of tools.
sentences.chinese: 凸邊的整個鋁體可以不使用工具，輕易地更換筆尖。

sentences.english: The first type of frame I will show you is a raised or lowered border.
sentences.chinese: 我將要介紹的第一類邊框是凸邊或凹邊。
